website_summaries.verdict: It's expensive, but the Logitech Cordless Headset is a luxury every deep-pocketed Xbox Live player should consider.

customer_reviews.title: the device was covered in a plastic like oil - this is due to the package sitting ...
customer_reviews.text: When I got this item in the mail I was expecting a headset for a xbox one, must have been the wording in the listing that mislead me - I am a detail oriented person and not quick to make orders. Even if I had the intent to order this for a gen 1 xbox, the device was covered in a plastic like oil - this is due to the package sitting in the sun for ten years and the rubber material breaking down. What a mess, disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: MOVE ON, DON'T BUY THIS! didn't work
customer_reviews.text: We did not try and use this until after the return period,(by a month) our previous controllers were not compatible with this, they don't connect to console but the controllers. but when we tried to use it, the headset was very "sticky" and kind of covered with a grime, may be it was in the plastic packaging too long. Also, it would not charge at all. I would give a negative 5 if possible.
customer_reviews.author: P.M.

customer_reviews.title: Very old battery most likely will not work
customer_reviews.text: This product is ancient but Logitech got the design of the ear piece perfect. It feels great but the battery could hold no juice when I got mine. I tried returning it but changed my mind and figured I could gut it and put different innards in it.
customer_reviews.author: Pane

customer_reviews.title: Not for xbox 360
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product mistakenly thinking it was for the xbox 360, but it is not. Amazon suggests buying this with a 360 controller, which would be a waste. I do wish the product description was a bit more clear.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Jones

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping but the glue in the item seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping but the glue in the item seems to have melting & spread all over the product I unfortunately d to return
customer_reviews.author: Rogue317

customer_reviews.title: Came with a gross sticky substance
customer_reviews.text: Opened up the package and it was super sticky and nasty. Like it was left somewhere really hot and it started to melt.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lamon

customer_reviews.title: Not all it was cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: We ended up exchanging the cordless communicator with a corded one. When it was delivered it didn't work and we were told to troubleshoot it online. The website had testimonials from many people who had the same problem...power would not come on on the headset even though the light was on on the unit it plugs into. We decided to exchange for a corded model since there wasn't to much of a warranty and we wanted to ensure we ended up with something that actually worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 didn't work
customer_reviews.text: O.k. We ordered one of these. It didn't work. Sent it back (paid the shipping to do so), and received a replacement. The second one did not work. Rumor is these things are glichy. We kept the second one didn't want to pay return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Nagy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this item
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this item. It fell apart on me a few minutes after I took It out of the package . I was never able to use it. Very poor craftsmanship. Its very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Belen Garcia

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, didn't work, had to return. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: this is a good headset for the price. my son uses it very often. we would buy logitech brand again.
customer_reviews.author: L  Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I heard this product is good for an wireless headset for Xbox one but I received it today got it out of the package it was all sticky on the headset. I hope it charges n works. Otherwise I'm returning it n getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Not for Xbox 360 unfortunately..not enough good headsets for 360 yet, but this works well enough in original
customer_reviews.author: Gary Harmer

customer_reviews.title: Dealz4Real Xbox Headset
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 Xbox sets from Dealz4real and got them ontime but neither of the 2 work. From 2 other review I just read Dealz4real is not very good at replacing products. Will update after I cotact them.
customer_reviews.author: David Torres

customer_reviews.title: This sucks
customer_reviews.text: This comes stickey. It is absolutely gross and everyone says that is compatible with xbox360. This is horrible

customer_reviews.title: This is not for the Xbox one
customer_reviews.text: This is not a Xbox one headset its a (Xbox) headset
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware cheap headset.
customer_reviews.text: Headset broke at opening pakage. After opening headset had a sticky residue all over it. Will not purchase this ever again. And buyer beware. Packaging stronger than headset.
customer_reviews.author: George Villafane

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not for X-box 360 or Xbox one. Description needs to be more clear.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Kahler

customer_reviews.title: make something for xbox one please!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: ok mybe if i spent 5 bucks it would be ok but i was thinking that i could use it for xbox one why do they have this for the old systems and not for the new ones. does NOT make sense lets go backwards and play with wired controllers next.
customer_reviews.author: tagana

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this I was under the impression it would work for my xbox 360 but it doesnt. If I had known that upfront I would not have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R Mangini

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not work for xbox one. I threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Best Solution for wireless XBox
customer_reviews.text: First things first, there IS a mute button on this unit. If a user taps the power button, the sound will mute on and off. I'm guessing the previous reviewers who complained that there was no mute button either didn't read the instructions or couldn't figure out a product with three buttons on it (power/mute, volume up and volume down). Second, this is the best way to use the xbox communicator when you have a Logitech wireless controller. It works well, and I noticed no sound quality decrease from the regular XBox communicator.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Silverstone

customer_reviews.title: It's cool
customer_reviews.text: PROS: 1.) Wireless 2.) Small 3.) Lightweight 4.) You can talk to your friends when you're in the bathroom. 5.) It has a lot of noises to tell you it's turning on and off and when the volume is at its max. CONS: 1.) Cliking and poping noises 2.) My charger doesn't connect to the headset without a rubber band. 3.) There is zero background noise cancellation for high pitched noises, like my sister. 4.) Have to charge it, why can't it just have a fuel cell? 5.) No mute statis or indicator. 6.) It makes poping noises and a white noise
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hudelson

customer_reviews.title: Poor Price, Poor Quality, Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: I have three complaints about this headset ► $80 is simply too much to pay for an X-Box headset. ► The ear-holding mechanism broke within a week of purchase ► The mute button is on the ear piece and there is not so much as a mute indicator on the communicator plug. I deeply regret this purchase. Even before it broke, I had reverted to the headset that came with my X-Box Live subscription. The mute thing is also a bummer. I was never sure if I was muted or not. It seems to me like a huge oversight on the part of the designer.
customer_reviews.author: DisQuoi

customer_reviews.title: Cordless headset
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset for Christmas, and I absolutely love it! It has a decent battery , but not that long to some hardcore gamers. The battery life is about average 6 Hours, plenty for me. The clarity improvement over the wired is nice also. It is a little pricy, but you pay to have the best.
customer_reviews.author: SHAWN W. PAGE

customer_reviews.title: Good product bad battery.
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem with the seller, the product came in good condition without any visable defects. The problem is that the battery didn't work upon arrival, after I replaced the battery (it is not one intended for replacement and I tinker in electronics a bit), The headset work as intended. Because of the nature of the headset the battery is very hard to replace and not intended to be replaced by the average user. So while the product worked as intended after a battery replacement, many customers may get a headset that dosen't work because of this problem.
customer_reviews.author: John Levengood

customer_reviews.title: One word: Sweeeeeeet
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for one day but I think this might be the greatest invention made for the xbox yet. it is comfy, it is clear as a bell and though pricey, it sure is nice. i really like that it does not need batteries, its like a cell phone and all you need to do is plug it in after you're done gaming and it'll charge it up. i'd definitely say this is a safe buy for anyone willing to part with the money.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Second Time...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time i have had a defective product from this company.Like the other fellow,i did a full charge on the unit and it wouldn't go past 45 minutes.I did this twice before i called their service dept.They said send it back to where i purchased it for a replacement or a refund.The seller took care of it but still lost on the shipping charge back.Another thing is the battery is not user replaceable.Turn around time for a battery from them is about a month.Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Cyberdemonbfg

customer_reviews.title: great communicator
customer_reviews.text: this communicator is the best i have ever used. i own a game center and play video games for extended amounts of time. it remains comfortable. tha phoenix
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: The liberation of being completely wireless is fantastic! The design is not only flawless in terms of practical use and comfort, but the unit is small and super sleek as well. Where things fall apart is the sound. Voices are distorted, there is intermittent radio static, and a persistent white noise in the background. The sound would have been acceptable for a $20 price, but at 80 bones you can be sure I'll be getting a refund on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Draz

customer_reviews.title: Best Headset!!!
customer_reviews.text: Headset is awesome. Fits very snug on your ear and does not irritate over time. Has crystal clear 2.4ghz channel. 9 Hours of game time and only takes at the most, 1.5 hours to charge. Gaming is a lot more fun!
customer_reviews.author: J. Green

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS I repeat DO NOT BUY THIS. Does not hold a charge. Garbage. You'd think Logitech would've fixed this by now its been out for a while. Like a friend told me thats probably why you can't buy it in stores anymore. I wish amazon would let you put no stars, actually this deserves a -20 rating
customer_reviews.author: A. Will

customer_reviews.title: feeling lucky?
customer_reviews.text: Initial shipping was fast, but the communicator did not work. I've been trying to get a refund for the product for a couple weeks, but customer service seems slow, and tried to send me a replacement, when I wanted a refund. So if you get a headset that works, great, but mine didn't, and it's been no fun going back and forth with customer service.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Meh, It's Alright
customer_reviews.text: This headset has great range, and provides a clear sound both through the microphone and ear piece. However, my only complaint is the short life this headset has. After about an hour, the headset would die, and the only way to use it would be with the power chord attached. But other than that, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Parker

customer_reviews.title: very bad product
customer_reviews.text: I had the original xbox communicator, but i broke it. I was given the cordless one for chrismas this year and at the beginning it worked fine, but it does not hold a charge and is cheaply made. I thought logitech would not put out such a bad peice of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: K. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have ordered two, one from this company and one from Dealz4Real. This one was sent quickly and worked fine. The other one from Dealz4Real didn't work and the returns process was ridiculous with terrible customer service. Oh yeah, It didn't work when I got the replacement! Go with this vendor. Perfect out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur A. Wasik

customer_reviews.title: Xbox Cordless head death battery!
customer_reviews.text: the microphone never worked because the battery was dead. Costumer service attention very good though. they returned a new one for me after I complained but it also had the same problem. they return my money, but the microphone never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Hi, There is a constant pinging white noise. People complain about their audio being bad because of it. This headset is heavy. Yes, it looks cool, but have you seen the bluetooth headsets? Need I say more? I am very disappointed in Logitech. -Edward
customer_reviews.author: Edward M. Meshuris

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: i got it in only 2 days..... If you search around it is a $65 headset, so for $22.07 It is a great deal!!! The headset is awesome, and works My only con to it was "that i didn't buy it sooner"
customer_reviews.author: Jazzper W. Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible in every way
customer_reviews.text: The battery only lasted 10 minutes, per each 6 hour charge. The microphone ear clip is also weak and doesn't stay on my ear. This is a very bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Recipient

customer_reviews.title: Item Returned
customer_reviews.text: The cordless head set didn't work and so I returned. I did return this item and did get my money back. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A. Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Looks Fab!
customer_reviews.text: I do not own the headset yet, but I have already ordered it from amazon, and It is supposed to come awhile after my xbox live starter kit, so I will have to use my louzy wired controler with the stock headset until this new one comes. My impression is that it will be a very good product, because it is logitech, and i have that wireless joystick for pc that they make, and it is fablous. The price? Great price. I got mine for somthing like $25. (buy from abuy4u)but it looks like a great product and i look foward to reciving my headset. Yes, 6 hours can last me a weekend.
customer_reviews.author: racecaristhesamebackwards

product_meta.title: Xbox Cordless Head Set Communicator
product_meta.description:
The Logitech Cordless Headset for Xbox offers gamers a fully wireless solution for playing and communicating over Xbox Live. The headset uses 2.4Ghz technology to allow for clear audio transmission without interference or delays. Its 30 foot range offers unprecedented cordless performance. Taunt your opponents, coordinate teammates and issue commands -- all with complete cordless freedom! Rechargeable batteries give you 6 hours of play time Box includes - Cordless Headset, Xbox Communicator, AC power adapter, setup guide and free 2 month Xbox Live trial subscription

AMAZON.COM
Taunt your deflated opponents in Madden NFL 2005 or coordinate multiplayer scenarios in Halo 2 with this Logitech cordless Xbox headset designed for online gameplay. Ideal for the million-plus people in 24 countries who subscribe to Xbox Live, the headset features a 2.4 GHz cordless transmitter with a range of up to 30 feet, so restless gamers can roam freely during particularly tense moments. Even better, there are no cords to trip over or cables to yank free when the action heats up. The headset includes an adjustable noise-canceling microphone that blocks out unwanted background noise, along with a high-quality earpiece with crystal-clear sound that ensures you never miss a command (or an insult). And unlike many cheaper models, this headset is both rugged and lightweight, with a snug fit that feels comfortable for hours of consecutive gameplay. The device runs for up to six hours per battery charge, giving you plenty of juice each gaming session. U.S. gamers receive an added bonus thanks to the free two-month Xbox Live trial subscription that comes with each headset. Whether you're a talkative sports junkie or a natural-born commando leader, the Logitech headset is a perfect fit. The headset requires an Xbox Live-enabled game and an Xbox Live broadband subscription to operate. 

 What's in the Box
Cordless headset, Xbox communicator, AC adapter, rechargeable batteries, setup guide, two-month Xbox Live subscription (U.S. only).
feature_bullets: Compact and comfortable design -- it's rugged, lightweight, and fits snugly on your ear
Adjustable noise-canceling microphone blocks out unwanted background noise
Robust 2.4 GHz technology provides clear audio with no interference or delays, at a range of 30 feet
Xbox Live Enabled - Go up against a million gamers in 24 countries
Compatible with original Xbox console. Not compatible with Xbox 360 or Xbox One.
